mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAP(MAP_ADDR, LATITUDE, HARDNESS) VALUES(#{mapAddr}, #{latitude}, #{hardness})
mapper.select: SELECT M.NAME ,M.ID, M.GENDER, M.BIRTH , C.COMMON_NAME FROM MEMBER M, TRAINER_REGISTER T, COMMON C WHERE M.ID = T.TRAINER_ID AND T.REG_STATUS = C.COMMON_CODE AND T.REG_STATUS = 'RS00' ORDER BY T.REGISTER_DATE

SELECT M.NAME, C.COMMON_NAME,F.CLS_NAME,TO_CHAR(F.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE,TO_CHAR(F.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE ,F.YOIL,F.CLS_STATUS, F.CLS_CODE FROM FIT_CLASS F, COMMON C, MEMBER M WHERE F.CLS_CATEGORY = C.COMMON_CODE AND F.TRAINER_ID = M.ID AND F.CLS_STATUS = 'CS00' ORDER BY START_DATE
SELECT M.NAME ,M.ID, M.GENDER, M.BIRTH , C.COMMON_NAME FROM MEMBER M, TRAINER_REGISTER T, COMMON C WHERE M.ID = T.TRAINER_ID AND T.REG_STATUS = C.COMMON_CODE ORDER BY T.REG_STATUS

SELECT F.CLS_CODE, F.TRAINER_ID, C.COMMON_NAME, F.CLS_NAME, TO_CHAR(F.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(F.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, F.START_TIME, F.END_TIME, F.LAPSE, F.CLS_LEVEL, F.PER_PRICE, F.CLS_INFO, F.CURRICULUM, F.MAX_MEM, F.CALORIE,M.NAME, F.YOIL FROM FIT_CLASS F, MEMBER M, COMMON C WHERE F.TRAINER_ID =M.ID AND F.CLS_CATEGORY =C.COMMON_CODE AND CLS_CODE = #{value}

SELECT M.NAME, C.COMMON_NAME,F.CLS_NAME,TO_CHAR(F.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE,TO_CHAR(F.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE ,F.YOIL,F.CLS_STATUS, F.CLS_CODE FROM FIT_CLASS F, COMMON C, MEMBER M WHERE F.CLS_CATEGORY = C.COMMON_CODE AND F.TRAINER_ID = M.ID ORDER BY F.CLS_STATUS,START_DATE

SELECT P.CLS_CODE, P.MEM_ID, P.ORIGIN_PRICE, P.PAID_PRICE, P.COMMISSION, P.NET_PRICE, P.PAY_DATE, F.TRAINER_ID, C.COMMON_NAME FROM PAYMENT P, FIT_CLASS F, COMMON C WHERE P.CLS_CODE = F.CLS_CODE AND F.CLS_CATEGORY = C.COMMON_CODE AND TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE,'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')

SELECT P.CLS_CODE, P.MEM_ID, P.ORIGIN_PRICE, P.PAID_PRICE, P.COMMISSION, P.NET_PRICE, P.PAY_DATE, F.TRAINER_ID, C.COMMON_NAME FROM PAYMENT P, FIT_CLASS F, COMMON C WHERE P.CLS_CODE = F.CLS_CODE AND F.CLS_CATEGORY = C.COMMON_CODE AND TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1) ,'YYYYMM')

SELECT TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE WITHDRAWAL = 'WD00' AND ROLE='RL00' AND TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE WITHDRAWAL = 'WD00' AND ROLE='RL01' AND TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT C.CDATE , NVL(D.RPRICE,0) AS RPRICE FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - (INTERVAL '1' MONTH)*(LEVEL-1) ,'YY/MM' ) AS CDATE FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM'),-1) FROM DUAL)) C
LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE,'YY/MM') RDATE, SUM(P.ORIGIN_PRICE) RPRICE FROM PAYMENT P, FIT_CLASS F, COMMON C WHERE P.CLS_CODE = F.CLS_CODE AND F.CLS_CATEGORY = C.COMMON_CODE AND TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE,'YYYY') = '2021'
AND C.COMMON_NAME = #{value}
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE,'YY/MM')) D ON C.CDATE = D.RDATE ORDER BY C.cdate
